title: Eric Motley: "Madison Park"
description: A conversation on achieving the American Dream, thanks to having hope and learning life lessons in the town from where he came - hear Eric Motley join Michael with his book "Madison Park: A Place of Hope." Original air date 9 February 2018. The book was published on 14 November 2017.
author: podcasts@siriusxm.com (Eric Motley, Michael Smerconish)
